name: Tiny Orb
description:
This is an early build so some things are still missing/incomplete. I'm open to suggestions and feedback :D! My record is level 48!

Gameplay

Select stats, an item, and an ability at the start

Clear all blocks and enemies to open the exit

Pick a new item at the end of each level (All items stack)

After killing all enemies, you can launch while you are moving

Controls

Launch: Click and drag. Drag farther to increase launch speed

Use Ability: Click anywhere. Some abilities can't be used near tiles and enemies

Esc/P: View inventory
